content: Phase 1: Create Safe Workspace - Set up isolated integration directory
Phase 1: Test Existing MCP System - Verify current system works before integration
Phase 2: Create MCP Client - Safe client to connect to existing MCP server
Phase 2: Create Discovery Bridge - Bridge between Universal Discovery and MCP
Phase 3: Create Discovery Router - New FastAPI router for Universal Discovery
Phase 3: Create Safe Mounting Script - Script to safely mount new router
Testing: Verify Integration - Test all components and ensure no breaking changes
